data.title: How many physics laureates can you match?
data.meta_description: Can you pair the portrait of the Nobel Prize laureate in physics with the image representing the Nobel Prize awarded discovery? Drag the images from the left to the right to pair, and press check to see your result. Don’t recognise the laureates? Keep scrolling down for some extra help below the game. Want to […]
data.text:
Featured physics laureates

Wilhelm Conrad Röntgen

The Nobel Prize in Physics 1901 in recognition of the extraordinary services he has rendered by the discovery of the remarkable rays subsequently named after him.

Nils Gustaf Dalén

The Nobel Prize in Physics 1912 for his invention of automatic regulators for use in conjunction with gas accumulators for illuminating lighthouses and buoys.

Subrahmanyan Chandrasekhar

The Nobel Prize in Physics 1983 for his theoretical studies of the physical processes of importance to the structure and evolution of the stars.

Jack S. Kilby

The Nobel Prize in Physics 2000 for his part in the invention of the integrated circuit.

Isamu Akasaki

The Nobel Prize in Physics 2014 for the invention of efficient blue light-emitting diodes which has enabled bright and energy-saving white light sources.
